subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the capital of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान का किस निगमन में है?
explanation_en: Jaipur is the capital of Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: जयपुर, राजस्थान का निगमन में है।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which forts are famous in Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Rajasthan is famous for its rich history and majestic forts. Some of the famous forts in Rajasthan are Amber Fort, Meena Bazaar, Kumbhalgarh Fort, and Chittorgarh Fort.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान के सामरसा पारंकार और मेना बाजार, कुम्बलगढ़फोट और चिट्टोगढ़फोट
